participant_1.background:
I'm going to visit my brother in another city.
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
i trust in god.
I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.
My siblings are my favorite people because they are always there for me and we have so much fun together.

participant_2.background:
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: Hi! I'm [name], nice to meet you!
Hey [name], nice to meet you too! My name is [name].
I'm going to visit my brother in another city tomorrow, he lives in a really cool place.
Oh, that's awesome! I love visiting new places. I'm from Bali, which is a really exotic place.
Bali sounds like a really cool place, I've always wanted to go there!
You should definitely go! It's so beautiful and the people are so friendly.
I'll definitely have to look into it! I'm also a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
Gummy worms are my favorite! I love eating them.
I'm glad to hear that! I love making them too. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to run and drink chai tea. I also like to collect rocks and make macaroni art.
Those are all really cool hobbies! I've never been much of a runner, but I love chai tea. I've never tried rock collecting or macaroni art, but they sound like they could be really fun.
They are both really fun! You should definitely try them sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about my hobbies.
Me too! I love learning about new things.
Well, I'm glad we met! I hope you have a great time visiting your brother.
